p: This is shown in Figures 2a and 2b. The comparison of the total ion chromatogram with mass traces of key fragments enables the assignment of individual peaks, here to the fluorinated impurities with their key fragment CF 3 (mass 69) and for the incompletely fluorinated impurities with the terminal group HCF 2 (mass 51), derivatives of methyl-perfluoroalkanoates (mass 59) and 1H,1H fluoroalkan-1-oles (mass 61), leachables (mass 91), perfluoro-alkenes (mass 93), and perfluorofurane (mass 97).
